title: Creative New Jersey Seaside Stay with Rooftop Restaurant & Bowling Alley
description: Jump into the Jersey Shore with a stay at The Asbury Hotel, just steps from the beloved Asbury Park Boardwalk in New Jersey. At this lovingly restored 1950s redbrick delight, you can dive into the local music scene over a drink at Soundbooth, catch a movie at the scenic Baronet rooftop cinema or kick back by picturesque outdoor pool. Breezy and bright rooms with contemporary character set The Asbury apart, all on the doorstep of the areaâ€™s most sought-after seaside strip.
offer_address: 210 Fifth Ave, Asbury Park, New Jersey, 07712, United States
